listProblem.detailsInfo:
Reports shadowing built-in names, such as `len` or `list`.

**Example:**

```
def len(a, b, c):
    d = a + b + c
    return d
```

In this code fragment, the `len` built-in name is used. The IDE offers to
apply the Rename refactoring as a fix.

listProblem.comment: PEP 8: E501 line too long (150 > 120 characters)
listProblem.detailsInfo: Reports violations of the [PEP 8 coding style guide](https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0008/) by running the bundled [pycodestyle.py](https://github.com/PyCQA/pycodestyle) tool.
